MODS:titleInfo.MODS:title: 3" & 1/2" scale & full size details -- fence on south of annex in elevation and section; section through sun room; F.S. details new finish in annex & bungalow -- P.M. in bungalow, side casings, base of moulding; 1 1/2" detail of cornice; elevation of openings between bedrooms & sun rooms (some omit side 1ts, see plan for other arrangements); section through closet no. 2, section through closet no. 1, elevation of closet showing style old finish; section thro' closet doors; casement window sill; F.S. sash door section; 9.

MODS:mods.MODS:note: Digital image created from an analog slide.
